meanings.definition: A group of insects characterized by having six legs.
meanings.sent1: I saw some hexapods crawling on the ground.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study hexapods to learn more about insects.
meanings.sent3: The hexapods were having a race to see who could reach the finish line first.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the hexapods danced on the petals like tiny performers.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful hexapods flying around the park.

meanings.definition: Any member of the class Hexapoda, including insects.
meanings.sent1: Hexapods play a crucial role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: The zoo had a special exhibit featuring various hexapods.
meanings.sent3: At the insect party, all the hexapods were dressed in tiny tuxedos.
meanings.sent4: The hexapods in the forest whispered secrets to the trees.
meanings.sent5: The hexapods scurried around the picnic blanket, looking for crumbs to eat.
